metadata.name: ch5-slider
--ch5-slider--height:
metadata.description:
description: Height for slider. Note: If orientation is vertical then height variable will be set to width css property and vice-versa
  type: unit
  values: px, vw, vh, em, rem, %
  example: 18px 
  related-theme-variable: --theme-ch5-slider--height

metadata.name: --ch5-slider--target-border-width:
metadata.description:
description: Width for slider target
  type: unit
  values: px, vw, vh, em, rem, %
  example: 1px 
  related-theme-variable: --theme-ch5-slider--target-border-width

metadata.name: --ch5-slider--handle-border-width:
metadata.description:
description: Slider handle border width
  type: unit
  values: px, vw, vh, em, rem, %
  example: 1px 
  related-theme-variable: --theme-ch5-slider--handle-border-width

metadata.name: --ch5-slider--target-border-style:
metadata.description:
description: Slider border style
  type: list
  values: none, solid, dotted, dashed, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset
  example: solid 
  related-theme-variable: --theme-ch5-slider--target-border-style

metadata.name: --ch5-slider--handle-border-style:
metadata.description:
description: Slider handle border style
  type: list
  values: none, solid, dotted, dashed, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset
  example: solid 
  related-theme-variable: --theme-ch5-slider--handle-border-style

metadata.name: --ch5-slider--width-x-small:
metadata.description:
description: Width of slider for size=x-small. Note: If orientation is vertical then width variable will be set to height css property
  type: unit
  values: px, vw, vh, em, rem, %
  example: 200px 
  related-theme-variable: --theme-ch5-slider--width-x-small

metadata.name: --ch5-slider--width-small:
metadata.description:
description: Width of slider for size=small. Note: If orientation is vertical then width variable will be set to height css property
  type: unit
  values: px, vw, vh, em, rem, %
  example: 250px 
  related-theme-variable: --theme-ch5-slider--width-small

metadata.name: --ch5-slider--width-regular:
metadata.description:
description: Width of slider for size=regular. Note: If orientation is vertical then width variable will be set to height css property

metadata.name: --ch5-slider--width-large:
metadata.description:

  values: px, vw, vh, em, rem, %
